title: Broken Lives
description: Emma Greyson thought she had it all, until she was faced with Alec Collinsâ€™ ugly past.While Alec tries to leave the past in the past and move on to the future, his wife, Molly, has other plans for her husband. After Emma is stalked and taunted by Molly, Alec makes a decision that could change everything. Will he stay with Emma? Will he leave and be with his wife and the mother of his daughter? Does Alec make the right choice? Only time will tell.
author: Brenda Kennedy
